Factsheet

OhiraKyou

Platforms:

ohirakyou.itch.io/nytro
Regular Price:
TBA, demo is free

Description

Nytro is an in-development exploration and collectible-focused 3D platformer game inspired by the original Spyro trilogy. The game features Nytro, a robot cat that can jump, charge, glide, and swim around colorful worlds, collecting bolts and golden gears to unlock new worlds to explore.

History

Until December of 2017, the developer owned a cat named Nitro, given the name for the way she frequently charged from one end of the house to the other while leaping across furniture. Expecting it to be Nitro's last year (due to age), he decided to make Nytro as a spiritual successor for two—Nitro and Spyro—passing along Nitro's fur pattern and behavior.

Features

  • Charging, gliding, and swimming.
  • An electric attack that can cause explosive container chain reactions.
  • Non-linear level progression in hub worlds.
  • A colorful, toony art style.

Videos
